thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Donald Siddell

author: Donald Siddell
title: Donald Siddell
text:
The Quote: for the rental was $189 with taxes and fees. Upon arrival, I was informed of a mandatory supplemental Liability insurance fee of $19.99 per day. There was not mention of this required insurance fee in the Quote: . There were several other charges also not mentioned in the Quote: . I ended up paying almost $100 over the Quote: d amount.
I would never do business with this company again and I recommend that you avoid them as well.
